name: Prison Escape (jarldredix)
description: Prison Escape is an extremely simple, to say the very least, attempt at a Text-based prison game where your choices decide the outcome, A.K.A, whether you live, whether that be to once again be chucked into your barren and deprivative jail cell, or escape to the outside world and 'supposed freedom. Or whether you die a gruesome death at the hands of jail dogs, barbed wiring, and basically any death or scenario I could possibly think to put into the game. If you donate, you can have a specific, of pratically any sort, put forward by yourself and I would happily insert it into the game (would save me the trouble of thinking up scenarios myself anywhose). Thanks for playing it! Hope you enjoy the short experience.
